thread.title: BRIEF-Videocon d2h Says Dish TV India Nominated Jawahar Lal Goel And Ashok Mathai Kurien On Board Of Co‍​

title: BRIEF-Videocon d2h Says Dish TV India Nominated Jawahar Lal Goel And Ashok Mathai Kurien On Board Of Co‍​

organizations.name: dish tv india nominated jawahar lal goel and ashok mathai kurien on board of co‍​ market news
on board of co‍​ reuters staff
lal goel & ashok mathai kurien on co's board

text: Market News March 15, 2018 / 12:56 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Videocon d2h Says Dish TV India Nominated Jawahar Lal Goel And Ashok Mathai Kurien On Board Of Co‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Videocon d2h Ltd: * VIDEOCON D2H SAYS DISH TV INDIA NOMINATED JAWAHAR LAL GOEL AND ASHOK MATHAI KURIEN ON BOARD OF CO‍​ - SEC FILING * VIDEOCON D2H LTD - DISH TV INDIA NOMINATED JAWAHAR LAL GOEL & ASHOK MATHAI KURIEN ON CO'S BOARD IN PLACE OF AMITABH KUMAR AND RAJ KUMAR GUPTA‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2GvsoVG ) Further company coverage:
